verses.verse: The Lord <WH3068> said <WH5002> unto my Lord <WH113>, Sit <WH3427> at my right hand <WH3225>, until I make <WH7896> your enemies <WH341> your footstool <WH1916>.
The Lord <WH3068> shall send <WH7971> the rod <WH4294> of your strength <WH5797> out of Zion <WH6726>: rule <WH7287> in the middle <WH7130> of your enemies <WH341>.

Your people <WH5971> shall be willing <WH5071> in the day <WH3117> of your power <WH2428>, in the beauties <WH1926> of holiness <WH6944> from the womb <WH7358> of the morning <WH4891>: you have the dew <WH2919> of your youth <WH3208>.
The Lord <WH3068> has sworn <WH7650>, and will not repent <WH5162>, You are a priest <WH3548> for ever <WH5769> after the order <WH1700> of Melchizedek <WH4442>.
The Lord <WH136> at your right hand <WH3225> shall strike <WH4272> through kings <WH4428> in the day <WH3117> of his wrath <WH639>.
He shall judge <WH1777> among the heathen <WH1471>, he shall fill <WH4390> the places with the dead bodies <WH1472>; he shall wound <WH4272> the heads <WH7218> over many <WH7227> countries <WH776>.
He shall drink <WH8354> of the brook <WH5158> in the way <WH1870>: therefore shall he lift up <WH7311> the head <WH7218>.
